titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to Robert Wilson
CWG13718

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
The State of Kentucky
To Robert Wilson Dr
I certify that the above account is correct and just that the articles were furnished as stated. and that they were a necessary for the public service.

J C Eversol maj
3 Bat 14" Ky Cav

Received at Frankfort on, the 20th of March 1863 of John W Finnell Quarter-master Adjutant General Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of One hundred an three -- Dollars and sixty two -- cents, in full of the above account.

Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno. W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky vols

no 78. Abst. A
Robt. Wilson
$10362
allowed Aug 8. 63
Suspend
Recpt not
signed
Original filed in 3rd auditors office Aug 13th 1874.
